flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: I started crafting this costume for my boyfriend the day before Halloween. It was made entirely out of recycled materials we had lying around, so it cost me nothing to make. No pattern was needed. The jacket was made from three pairs of old boots.
guide.introduction_rendered:
I started crafting this costume for my boyfriend the day before Halloween. It was made entirely out of recycled materials we had lying around, so it cost me nothing to make. No pattern was needed. The jacket was made from three pairs of old boots.

Tools
  • Sewing machine
guide.summary: Become Tim Burton's beloved, quirky character.
guide.title: Handmade Edward Scissorhands Costume
